de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical

Class MatrixParadigm

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical.MatrixParadigm

  • public class MatrixParadigm
extends java.lang.Object
    Shared code for algorithms that work on a strict matrix paradigm. Note that this requires \(O(n^2)\) memory (and often \(O(n^3)\) runtime). This class bridges the gap from the relational (indexed by identifiers) and the matrix view (indexed by integers 0...n-1). While this will usually store (merge-) distances when clustering, it can store arbitrary doubles.
    Since:
    0.7.5
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
